column3: If we are going to warn for this, then the default should be false, not true. However changing that may cause severe disruption to the network because many lightweight wallets use BIP 37. Until there is a suitable alternative to BIP 37 (e.g. [client side filtering](https://github.com/Roasbeef/bips/blob/master/gcs_light_client.mediawiki)) that is widely deployed, I don't think this is appropriate.

Agree with @achow101 - until there is a suitable alternative widely available, NACK.
